thread.section_title: Protea Hotel by Marriott Entebbe - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Uganda) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Lovely Stay Lovely View
thread.title_full: Lovely Stay Lovely View - Review of Protea Hotel by Marriott Entebbe, Entebbe, Uganda - TripAdvisor

author: David K
title: Lovely Stay Lovely View
text:
Enjoyed a lovely stay before our flight the following day. Received very friendly service from all staff. Beautiful view right on Lake Victoria. Breakfast the following morning was tasty. Lovely air conditioning to avoid the heat.
Room Tip: Eat food inside to avoid the lake flies. See more room tips
